message: Hi I run the outsourcing website http://taskarmy.com and I feel that the name doesn't correspond to the solution I am offering in the outsourcing space.
I would like to express things like simplicity / risk-free / frictionless / quality
Do you guys have some ideas of names I could use that explains better what TaskArmy is about?
Maybe focus on the objective of your ideal user? What do they wish to accomplish? And what phrase or name do you think is going to appeal to them as the solution to their problem?

Mmm...it’s okay. I’m not sure “hands free” is going to be in your consumers’ minds, but it’s likely something they can relate to. It could be perceived as a lack of control by some. Do you want to limit yourself to websites?
how about something like MyTeam or playing with the word Team in there so that you can buy the armenian domain .AM   ex:  MyTe.am, YourTe.am, TaskTe.am, etc..
I know this sounds a little weird, but I like it: why not HeyDoThis.com?  I think it gets your message across.  Be sure to pick up HeyDoThat.com, also available.
I like the name, simple and easy to remember.
